javadoc:
Icon class for for displaying overlapping icons.  Icons are drawn in the order they
 are added.

methods.javadoc:
Constructs a new MultiIcon with an initial base icon that will always be drawn first.
@param baseIcon the base icon that will always be drawn first.
methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Constructs a new MultiIcon with an initial base icon that will always be drawn first.

params.name: baseIcon
params.comment: the base icon that will always be drawn first.

methods.javadoc:
Constructs a new MultiIcon with an initial base icon that will always be drawn first.
@param baseIcon the base icon that will always be drawn first.
methods.name: <init>

params.name: baseIcon

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Construct a new MultiIcon with the provided base image and subsequent images

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Construct a new MultiIcon with a predetermined size

params.name: baseIcon
params.comment: Primary icon that is always drawn first

params.name: disabled
params.comment: flag to draw this icon in a disabled state

methods.name: addIcon
methods.comment:
Adds an icon that is to be drawn on top of the base icon and any other icons that
 have been added.

methods.javadoc: Return array of Icons that were added to this MultIcon.
methods.name: getIcons
methods.comment: Return array of Icons that were added to this MultIcon.

name: MultiIcon
comment:
Icon class for for displaying overlapping icons.  Icons are drawn in the order they
 are added.
